body: 有點期待後續了,沒想到會在在N站裡認真的看故事
I've literally read this in mangadex til ch. 7.5
@DBD @SimpForLife sound like a challenge to me. Challenge Accepted.

@Danzaiver that's what drawn people to read it. What's going on inside her head to the point she decided to become AV despite her phobia? Moreover, seems like it's based on the author's true story too

I've read this manga, is so contradictory, she supposedly develop androphobia due to her experiences, but then ended working as a JAV, it's like someone with arachnophobia ended with a degree in entomology with a specialization in arachnids and have a collection of live specimens in his house and he take care of that creatures, sleep with them, suck ther spider legs, make love with them and after that he go to cry in a manga "I'm arachnophobic".

I don't know, to me, she is only trying to blame in to others for her bad life choises, maybe as a child she was a victim, but since she is an adult she is reponsable for her choises, but at the end Japan have high rates of women working in the adult industry for the easy money.

A girl from my class in elementary school were violated by his step-father when she was 11, maybe from years before, and she don't even were like this, you never could imagine she had that esperiences, but she were pretty loud and foul mouthed girl in that then. The l

I don't know why this is posted on here but for  your information, this manga is based on the author's genuine experience during her childhood. It's about how a girl who's scared of men became a pornstar (JAV). I would say this is worst than any ntr doujins you had ever read ... Get your tissues ready
Bro,this is sad i came here to masturbate but now I'm crying
